change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 74/2010, effective March 11, 2010.

section.sectiontext: For the purposes of paragraph (b) of the definition of "public sector employer" in the Public Sector Employers Act, the following corporations and unincorporated boards, commissions, councils, bureaus, authorities and similar bodies are exempted:
section.secsandwich: Organized Crime Agency of British Columbia Society

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 145/2013, effective April 1, 2013.

section.sectiontext: For the purposes of paragraph (b) of the definition of "public sector employer" in the Public Sector Employers Act, the following corporations and unincorporated boards, commissions, councils, bureaus, authorities and similar bodies are exempted:
section.secsandwich: Organized Crime Agency of British Columbia Society
